metadata.title: CVE-2018-6508 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Puppet Enterprise 2017.3.x prior to 2017.3.3 are vulnerable to a remoteexecution bug when a specially crafted string was passed into thefacter_task or puppet_conf tasks. This vulnerability only affects tasks inthe affected modules, if you are not using puppet tasks you are notaffected by this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: puppet-module-puppetlabs-apt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
puppet-module-puppetlabs-apache package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
puppet-module-puppetlabs-mysql package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
